messages.title: The Tory candidate who has NEVER put Warrington first!
messages.content: The Tory candidate wants you to believe that she's on your side, and that she will fight for the interests of the electorate, but Helen Jones reveals the real story. She has a history of flip-flopping between communities and has never put Warrington North first.

mentions.candidate: Helen Jones is the only candidate who will put Warrington North first.

issues.governance: Defending Halton schools, Widnes businesses, and interests in Greater Manchester.

leaflet.personalStatement: Labour's Helen Jones is the only candidate who will put Warrington North first. She has a record of defending local interests, and standing up for local people. She lives here with her family — she’s one of us.

contactInformation.address: Gilbert Wakefield House 67 Bewsey Street Warrington WA2 7JQ

images.caption: Image of Helen Jones with Labour Party logo

leaflet.additionalNotes: P.S. See overleaf for details of the Tory candidate's interests – they're certainly not in Warrington!
